page.title: 10RECREATIONAL FACILITIES
page.content: Our 11-14 year olds think that the facilities in our area are good.There are many local rural walks.The following features were identified: Herontyre-none on the estate but very near to Sackville School for athletics and the Adult Education Centre, sports and pub complex at Dunnings Mills,ATC centre and .22 rifle range. Estcots- East Court Park, 1 cricket square, 5 football pitches, tennis courts,rifle range, town museum, a band stand. Ashurstwood- John Piers Park (2 tennis courts), The "Wreck", 2 pubs, village hall( W.I. discos, badminton, 5-a-side football). Forest Row- 2 parks ,one social club, 3 pubs, one snooker club, 1 video library and a youth club.
